This Flutter app is named 'kanakupulla' and is for managing monthly expenses and budget planning. Features should include:
- Add, edit, and delete expenses
- Set monthly budgets
- Categorize transactions
- View reports and charts
- Track transactions manually and via online import (bank statement or API)
- Support for importing transactions from online sources

Prioritize clean architecture, modular code, and a modern, user-friendly UI.
